transcript: Hi, I need to see a doctor. I've been having severe migraines for three days. Tuesday afternoon works best. My insurance is Aetna, ID 5550123.
I don't know if I can do this anymore. I'm feeling really unstable and I might hurt myself.
I need an appointment next week.
I slipped on ice and think I broke my ankle. It's swollen and purple.
Hi, this is Sarah. I'm a returning patient. I need a refill on my anxiety meds.
Do you accept Blue Cross Blue Shield? I don't want to pay out of pocket.
I have a plan to end my life tonight. Please help me.
I can only come in on Sundays. Do you have anything then?
I have a high fever and a cough. I think it's the flu.
My name is David, born 1985. I'm feeling very depressed lately. I have Cigna insurance and want to see Dr. Lee on Monday morning.
